title: Ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, enabling programmatic access to local LLMs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, works in Node and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer for Ollama models, providing chains, agents, and callbacks.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chat, code highlighting, and RAG.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community Rust crate for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and Maven Central distribution.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style workflows.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams responses from any Ollama model.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper with interactive prompts, model aliases, and batch scripting.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama, allowing local models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for fine-tuning, multimodal, and edge deployments of Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Plug-and-play RAG stack using Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain with Docker Compose.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for summarizing notes, generating text, and Q&A using Ollama.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama API with async HTTP and JSON streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers for testing.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that proxies to Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming support.
